doc:
Peter Bell (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Bell_(actor) 0 John Bell (born 20 October 1997) is a Scottish actor who is best known for playing Bain in the last two instalments of The Hobbit film series, and "Young Ian" Murray in the Starz television series Outlander. His other notable roles include Angus in Battleship, Helius in Wrath of the Titans and as Toby Coleman in Tracy Beaker Returns. John_Bell ( born_20_October_1997 ) is a_Scottish_actor who is_best_known for playing Bain in the_last_two_instalments of The_Hobbit_film_series , and " Young_Ian_"_Murray in the_Starz_television_series_Outlander . His_other_notable_roles include Angus in Battleship , Helius in Wrath of the_Titans and as Toby_Coleman in Tracy_Beaker_Returns .
